name: stock_get_dividends_splits
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool webull.
Tool description: Query public data for investment products including stocks, fractional shares, options, ETFs, and ADRs as on webull.com
API description: Fetches stock dividends and splits data for a given ticker ID using the Webull API.

tickerid.description: The ticker ID of the stock for which to fetch dividends and splits data. This is the value of the tickerId field returned from endpoints such as /stock/search, /market/get-common-ranking, /market/get-top-active, and /market/get-top-gainers.
